issue.title: [C++] Add Future::DeferNotOk()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10196](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10196). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Provide a static method mapping Result<Future<T>> -> Future<T>. If the Result is an error, a finished future containing its Status will be constructed.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10196?focusedCommentId=17209708) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8362
